snippet: After a Twitter message by his current companion undermined his former partner, President François Hollande faces questions about how well he controls his personal life.
abstract: President Francois Hollande of France faces questions of how well he controls his personal life after recent headlines about his current companion Valerie Trierweiler and former romantic partner Segolene Royal.

byline.original: By MAÏA de la BAUME and STEVEN ERLANGER

lead_paragraph: After a Twitter message by his current companion undermined his former partner, President François Hollande faces questions about how well he controls his personal life.

headline.seo: In France, Women Close to President Hollande Cause Stir
headline.main: In France, New Chapter in Saga of All the President’s Women
headline.print_headline: In France, New Chapter in Saga of All the President’s Women
